newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish c.bank sells dollars at PLN 3.4880-dealers.
newsitem.headline: Polish c.bank sells dollars at PLN 3.4880-dealers.

text.p: The National Bank of Poland sold dollars on the interbank market at 3.4880 zlotys, dealers said.
The intervention, described as "medium-sized", came at 0910 GMT, when the zloty was at -3.58 percent from the dollar parity rate for today.
The zloty was at 3.13/3.55 percent below the trading band centre.
